[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: Much work has been done to establish what is thought to be true, but the program was written to reveal things that were hidden from view by the Sagittarius galaxy.

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: Many men and women who were brought here during their time, and many of their families who were left behind were either forgotten or died in that area, Italy and people who are not Italian.

[Samoan]: Ae ui i lea, o Peleseana (Belgians) uma ma Suisi (Swiss) e tautatala i le fa’a-Farani e ono a’oa’oina le gagana Farani masani i a’oga, ina ia mafai ona latou malamalama ia te oe tusa lava pe e te fa’aaogāina le sisitema fa’anumera i le gagana masani a Farani.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
